resources.string:
«ml:bluebird» Find words with a meaning similar to bluebird

«ml:duck:b*» Find words related to duck that start with the letter b

«ml:spoon:*a» Find words related to spoon that end with the letter a

«sl:elefint» Find words that sound like elefint

«t??k» Find words that start with t, end in k, and have two letters in between

«coneticut» words that are spelled similarly to coneticut

«rhy:forgetful» Find words that rhyme with forgetful

«rhy:grape:breakfast» Find words that rhyme with grape that are related to breakfast

«jjb:ocean» Find adjectives that are often used to describe ocean

«jjb:ocean:temperature» Find adjectives describing ocean sorted by how related they are to temperature

«jja:yellow» Find nouns that are often described by the adjective yellow

«jja:yellow:temperature» Find nouns that are often described by the adjective yellow sorted by how related they are to temperature

«lc:drink:w*» Find words that often follow drink in a sentence, that start with the letter w

«sug:rawand» Find suggestions if they have typed in rawand so far
This application will help you find words matching your query and find out their definitions\n\nApp made by Heavy Sea, 2016. All rights reserved.
